item.title: The Python Tutorial Notes - Chapter 5
item.description: Modified: July 19 2024 Data Structures 6/10/2024 5.1 More on Lists Methods for Lists: list.append(x) Adds an item to the end of the list Equivalent to a[len(a):] = [x] list.extend(iterable) Extend the list by appending all items from an iterable list.insert(i, x) Insert an item into a given position, where i is the index location and x is the value list.remove(x) Remove the first item from the list whose value is equal to x, ValueError if no such item list.
